name: LoadingMaterial
description: LoadingMaterial describes transportable; complementary non-Piece objects such as dry ice or nets

columns.name: otherIdentifiers
columns.description: Details about any other identifier; depending on the context of use

columns.name: materialModel
columns.description: Model of the LoadingMaterial if any

columns.name: serialNumber
columns.description: Serial number that allows to uniquely identify the object

columns.name: checks
columns.description: References to the CheckActions performed on the object

columns.name: skeletonIndicator
columns.description: Indicator whether a logistics object is a skeleton object

columns.name: involvedInActions
columns.description: References to the Actions the object is involved in
